name: TaskShuffle
0:
”Alexa, tell Task Shuffle to add task walk the dog.”
”add task get some sleep”
”what should i do”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task shuffle
des:
Task Shuffle keeps a personal collection of your tasks. Simply add tasks to your collection, and when you're feeling productive, ask Task Shuffle what to do. Task Shuffle will randomly pick a task from your list and read it back to you!

This keeps things interesting by adding a sense of randomness to your daily routines and helps you stay productive.
